data.prayer: Father, you desire the people in the state of Sa Kaeo who are far from you to hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Sa Kaeo, Thailand
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Sa Kaeo, Thailand.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

data.section_summary: On average, 53 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Sa Kaeo, Thailand.
data.prayer: Spirit, send your gospel to these.
Over 98.69 percent of the people of Sa Kaeo are far from Jesus. Lord, please send your gospel to them through the internet or radio or television today!
Spirit, cause the 4,041 believers in Sa Kaeo to obey with immediate, radical, costly obedience, like Abraham.
data.verse: Then God said, “Take your son, your only son, whom you love — Isaac — and go to the region of Moriah. Sacrifice him there as a burnt offering on a mountain I will show you.” Early the next morning Abraham got up and loaded his donkey. He took with him two of his servants and his son Isaac. When he had cut enough wood for the burnt offering, he set out for the place God had told him about.

data.prayer: Spirit, I pray that the Tai Dam people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.

Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Sa Kaeo, Thailand to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

data.prayer: Spirit, inspire new kinds of evangelism through social media in Sa Kaeo, Thailand.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist, discharge all the duties of your ministry.

data.prayer: Father, make bold the prophets in Sa Kaeo, Thailand so that the church can be equipped with truth and insight and a vision of your heart.
data.verse: These are the things which you should do: speak the truth to one another; judge with truth and judgment for peace in your gates.
